entity.name: reference_book
entity.query: select 10 as priority, concat('reference:', id) as id, isbn, title, author, publisher, formatted_author, category, edition, year, pages from reference.publications

entity.name: legacy_book
entity.query: select 2 as priority, concat('legacy:', id) as id, isbn, title, author, publisher, formatted_author, category, edition, year, pages from legacy.publications
